live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it.
38947.summary: Some customers in the Langara College area of South Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38947.title: June 27 - South Vancouver (Langara College Area) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
